name: professor-animal-js
description: Professor Animal is a game developed for Google Assistant and can be played on Google Home, Android devices and iOS devices with Google Assistant app. This is a classic Who am I? game and designed with Voice UI in mind. This game is best suited for children of age 5 or older.

scripts.run-local-initial: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -E '{"NODE_ENV":"dev"}' -e data/initial_request.js
scripts.run-local-followup-yes: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -E '{"NODE_ENV":"dev"}' -e data/followup_yes_request.js
scripts.run-local-followup-no: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -E '{"NODE_ENV":"dev"}' -e data/followup_no_request.js
scripts.run-local-followup-repeat: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -E '{"NODE_ENV":"dev"}' -e data/followup_repeat_request.js
scripts.run-local-glossary-enquiry: cd app && lambda-local -l index.js -h myHandler -E '{"NODE_ENV":"dev"}' -e data/followup_glossary_enquiry.js

author: Samuel Li <samli@samuelli.net>
